rundhE SRuqNvantyE#namaqgniM ci#kyAqnamattyannaq(gm)q rOca#ta iqyaM ~MvAva pra#thaqmA citiqrOSha#dhayOq vanaqspata#yaqH purI#Shamaqntari#kShaM dviqtIyAq vayA(gm)#siq purI#Shamaqsau tRuqtIyAq nakSha#trANiq purI#ShaM ~Myaqj~jaSca#tuqrthI 
dakShi#NAq purI#ShaqM ~Myaja#mAnaH pa~jcaqmI praqjA purI#ShaqM ~Myat trici#tIkaM cinvIqta yaqj~jaM dakShi#NAmAqtmAna#M praqjAmaqntari#yAqt tasmAqt pa~jca#citIkaScEtaqvya# EqtadEqva sarva(gg)# spRuNOtiq yat tiqsraScita#ya - [  ] 40
